comments.text:
User Agent:  

Steps to reproduce:

1. Start Firefox build from revision 040446311029.
2. Open about:buildconfig


Actual results:

Firefox displays
Built from http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/rev/40446311029


Expected results:

instead of
Built from http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/rev/040446311029

comments.text:
It's also wrong in the applications.ini:

[App]
Vendor=Mozilla
Name=Firefox
Version=8.0a1
BuildID=20110730062615
SourceRepository=http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central
SourceStamp=40446311029
ID={ec8030f7-c20a-464f-9b0e-13a3a9e97384}

But it's correct in the platform.ini:

[Build]
BuildID=20110730062615
Milestone=8.0a1
SourceStamp=040446311029
SourceRepository=http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central
comments.raw_text:
It's also wrong in the applications.ini:

[App]
Vendor=Mozilla
Name=Firefox
Version=8.0a1
BuildID=20110730062615
SourceRepository=http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central
SourceStamp=40446311029
ID={ec8030f7-c20a-464f-9b0e-13a3a9e97384}

But it's correct in the platform.ini:

[Build]
BuildID=20110730062615
Milestone=8.0a1
SourceStamp=040446311029
SourceRepository=http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central

comments.text:
This is probably Preprocessor.py still screwing us. :-/
bug 569373 and bug 581516 were other places this got fiddled.
